data.name: Abnormal Endurance
data.oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
data.flavor_text: Tenacity prevails when hopes die.

data.name: Absorb
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text: "In your misguided attempt to subvert the law, you have eloquently explained why the law must exist."

data.name: Act of Treason
data.oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Seen through Rakdos eyes, a cruel betrayal is a hilarious stunt.

data.name: Adamant Will

Flying, haste

Flying

data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Creatures can't attack you or a planeswalker you control unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures.
data.flavor_text: "The walls of Argive were built by a peaceful dynastic union that has guarded us against war for fifteen centuries. The lesson is clear."

data.name: Baloth Gorger
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
If Baloth Gorger was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.

data.name: Band Together
data.oracle_text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.

Banefire deals X damage to any target.
If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

data.name: Banehound
data.oracle_text: Lifelink, haste

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice two creatures.

Haste
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

data.oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

data.name: Beamsplitter Mage
data.oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Beamsplitter Mage, if you control one or more other creatures that spell could target, choose one of those creatures. Copy that spell. The copy targets the chosen creature.

data.name: Beast Whisperer
data.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

data.name: Bond of Flourishing

data.name: Bond of Insight

data.flavor_text: "Together we can unlock secrets no one has even dreamed of. I might even let you remember some of them."

data.name: Bond of Passion

data.name: Bond of Revival
